news.title: Federal Reserve Maintains Interest Rates, Markets React Positively
news.description: The Federal Reserve announced it will maintain benchmark interest rates at 5.25%-5.50%, in line with market expectations. Major US stock indices rose collectively, with investor confidence strengthening.

news.title: China GDP Growth Exceeds Expectations, Strong Economic Recovery
news.description: China's Q3 GDP grew 5.2% year-on-year, exceeding market expectations of 4.8%. Both consumption and investment showed improvement, with economic fundamentals continuing to strengthen.

news.title: European Central Bank Hints at Possible Rate Cut, Euro Under Pressure
news.description: ECB President Lagarde indicated the central bank may consider rate cuts if inflation continues to decline. EUR/USD exchange rate fell 0.8%.

news.title: Global Tech Stocks Rally on AI Breakthrough News
news.description: Global tech stocks rose collectively on AI technology breakthrough news. Nvidia, Microsoft and other tech giants hit record highs, with the AI concept continuing to heat up.

news.title: Oil Prices Drop Sharply on Global Growth Concerns
news.description: International oil prices fell more than 3% in a single day on concerns about slowing global economic growth. Energy sector stocks declined broadly.

news.title: UK Inflation Rate Falls to 2.5%, Below Expectations
news.description: UK CPI rose 2.5% year-on-year in October, below market expectations of 2.8%. Expectations for Bank of England rate cuts increased.
